name: Universidade do Sul de Santa Catarina (UNISUL)
display_name: Universidade do Sul de Santa Catarina (UNISUL)
description: UNISUL, the University of Southern Santa Catarina, is a non-profit university with multiple campuses in the state of Santa Catarina, Brazil. It is a regional, community university, juridically private and philanthropy-oriented. Unisul's Mission: To provide innovative and creative education and management in the processes of teaching, research and extension so as to fully enable citizens, through continuing education, to contribute to the creation of a humane society in permanent harmony with the advancements of science and technology.
